creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: dark blue satin damask shoe body; embroidered at front and sides with satin stitch floral design in pink, red, beige and green; open edge bound in black; upturned toe and lined heel flap; light reinforced sole (paper and fabric enclosed?) stitched throughout with heavy cord; lined on sides only in blue
title: Pair of Shoes
